TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/Rebar/ChevronVertical extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides objects for each state of a chevron. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Each property of the VisualStyleElement.Rebar.ChevronVertical class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for a different state of a chevron.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Rebar.ChevronVertical.Normal%2A> property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementRebarChevronVertical1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#211](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.windows.forms.v_96_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#211](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.windows.forms.v_96_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents a hot chevron.
Docs.value: A that represents a hot chevron.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Hot property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Hot property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementRebarChevronVertical2` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#212](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/63c90e94-dbe0-4003-9011-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#212](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/63c90e94-dbe0-4003-9011-_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents a normal chevron.
Docs.value: A that represents a normal chevron.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Normal property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Normal property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementRebarChevronVertical1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#211](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/64ddaca9-4835-4b5f-984c-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#211](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/64ddaca9-4835-4b5f-984c-_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents a pressed chevron.
Docs.value: A that represents a pressed chevron.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Pressed property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Pressed property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementRebarChevronVertical3` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#213](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/dadcbd0a-8240-4b4e-bb99-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#213](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/dadcbd0a-8240-4b4e-bb99-_1.vb)]
